### Expand() {#ab68ff3284bb0cb541c0a5a50c7c88cac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void VectorLegalizer::Expand (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42; Node, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &gt; &amp; Results)</>}>
Implement expand-based legalization of vector operations.

This is just a high-level routine to dispatch to specific code paths for operations to legalize them.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/legalizevectorops-cpp/#l00096">96</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/legalizevectorops-cpp">LegalizeVectorOps.cpp</a>.

### ExpandANY&#95;EXTEND&#95;VECTOR&#95;INREG() {#ab977dc1c87120397c5b35b6336463bc2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SDValue VectorLegalizer::ExpandANY&#95;EXTEND&#95;VECTOR&#95;INREG (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdnode">SDNode</a> &#42; Node)</>}>
Implement expansion for ANY&#95;EXTEND&#95;VECTOR&#95;INREG.

Shuffles the low lanes of the operand into place and bitcasts to the proper type. The contents of the bits in the extended part of each element are undef.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/legalizevectorops-cpp/#l00114">114</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/selectiondag/legalizevectorops-cpp">LegalizeVectorOps.cpp</a>.

### LegalizedNodes {#ac63f747ee8475b2702ceb0771cb8d133}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallDenseMap&lt;SDValue, SDValue, 64&gt; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LegalizeVectorOps.cpp&#125;::VectorLegalizer::LegalizedNodes</>}>
For nodes that are of legal width, and that have more than one use, this map indicates what regularized operand to use.

This allows us to avoid legalizing the same thing more than once.
